attributes.contentHtml: NickE that's actually sad. They must be somehow luring people in and making them believe they'll both benefit from it, while the people operating the host probably have realised themselves that they are not a reliable solution, e.g. one that they would recommend to a friend to start a Minecraft network or some more serious project

WilliamD I don’t have the screenshots at the moment because they’re on my other phone. But there was downtime for over a week on multiple nodes on the paid hosting. But rather than him fixing the paid nodes, he instead chose to fix the free nodes leaving the paid customers to complain in discord without replies
